Title: Asian LNG buyers have mixed reactions to threat of Australian LNG plant strikes
Description: The threat of strikes that have the potential to disrupt LNG exports at Woodside Energy’s 16.3 mtpa North West Shelf and Chevron’s 8.9 mtpa Wheatstone and 15.6 mtpa Gorgon LNG plants in Australia has created mixed reactions among Asian LNG buyers amid a recent rise in European gas and Asian LNG prices.
Author: CK

Title: Trade union urges Chevron’s workers to vote in favour of industrial action as ballot opens
Description: The Offshore Alliance trade union has urged employees at Chevron’s 15.6 mtpa Gorgon and 8.9 mtpa Wheatstone LNG plants and its offshore Wheatstone platform in Australia to vote in favour of industrial action as ballots for protected industrial action open from today.
Author: CK
